respStmt.name: EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis

change.item: Text scanned at U. Chicago in 1988. Basic SGML tagging by EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis.
Final check of cardbreaks, tags, and linenumbers.
Check text against TLG Sophocles in order to discover if there are any missing whole words or lines..
changed attribution of ll. 49-68 to Ismene.
Added speaker tags where they were missing.
added a period at line 17 and a raised dot at line 72

$Log: soph.ant_gk.xml,v $ Revision 1.6 2013-06-13 12:41:38 gcrane tagging now should be compatible with CTS
Revision 1.5 2012-11-20 18:47:12 ajones06 Changed the bibliographic information in the headers to reflect Francesco's discovery that the Greek text for these files was taken from the two-volume public domain Loeb version edited by Francis Storr.
Revision 1.4 2011-09-07 14:33:14 rsingh04 adding rend=displayNum to lb tags
Revision 1.3 2010-12-25 19:40:38 gcrane LB milestones instead of L tags
Revision 1.2 2010-12-24 13:05:02 gcrane ADD tags for lt/gt entities DEL tags for lsqb/rsqb entities
Revision 1.1 2010-12-24 12:51:10 gcrane base files for SDL
Revision 1.1 2009/12/08 18:56:08 rsingh04 moved more xml files around based on copyright status
Revision 1.2 2005/08/01 16:30:23 packel removed stray item tags
Revision 1.1 2005/07/25 15:02:57 packel Converted to XML
Revision 1.14 2004/04/21 20:41:59 mimno added card 1s
Revision 1.13 2003/07/01 22:18:08 yorkc Updated texts to TEI P4 and Perseus P4 extensions; minor cleanup (esp. character encodings and typos.)
Revision 1.12 2003/05/21 20:29:16 lcerrato changed e)s to w(s on line 463 confirmed by source
Revision 1.11 2000/10/27 14:14:57 amahoney fix a couple of stray typos
Revision 1.10 2000/09/14 16:57:45 lcerrato changed etos eis tos to etos eis etos at line 340
Revision 1.9 2000/06/08 17:48:58 lcerrato fixed two typos reported by users: one on line 370 (mht vs mh); one on line 411 (parwn instead of pagwn)
Revision 1.8 2000/03/04 20:35:17 dasmith Added separate funder entity to TEI header.
Revision 1.7 2000/02/15 23:18:01 amahoney use n attribute on sp element to carry over the speaker name when the speech is interrupted by a card break; this also requires that the card break at the end come after the close of the sp, not within
Revision 1.6 1999/11/24 21:12:07 amahoney Bring remaining files up to new DTD; use part=i and part=f for antilabe in all files

sp.l: ti/ fh/s; ti/s a)ndrw=n h)=n o( tolmh/sas ta/de;

sp.speaker: *fu/lac
sp.l: ou)k oi)=d': e)kei= ga\r ou)/te tou genh=|dos h)=n
plh=gm', ou) dike/llhs e)kbolh/. stu/flos de\ gh=
kai\ xe/rsos, a)rrw\c ou)d' e)phmaceume/nh
troxoi=sin, a)ll' a)/shmos ou(rga/ths tis h)=n.
o(/pws d' o( prw=tos h(mi\n h(merosko/pos
dei/knusi, pa=si qau=ma dusxere\s parh=n.
o( me\n ga\r h)fa/nisto, tumbh/rhs me\n ou)/,
lepth\ d', a)/gos feu/gontos w(/s, e)ph=n ko/nis
shmei=a d' ou)/te qhro\s ou)/te tou kunw=n
e)lqo/ntos, ou) spa/santos e)cefai/neto.
lo/goi d' e)n a)llh/loisin e)rro/qoun kakoi/,
fu/lac e)le/gxwn fu/laka, ka)\n e)gi/gneto
plhgh\ teleutw=s', ou)d' o( kwlu/swn parh=n.
ei(=s ga/r tis h)=n e(/kastos ou(ceirgasme/nos,
kou)dei\s e)nargh/s, a)ll' e)/feuge mh\ ei)de/nai.
h)=men d' e(toi=moi kai\ mu/drous ai)/rein xeroi=n
kai\ pu=r die/rpein kai\ qeou\s o(rkwmotei=n,
to\ mh/te dra=sai mh/te tw| cuneide/nai
to\ pra=gma bouleu/santi mhd' ei)rgasme/nw|.
te/los d' o(/t' ou)de\n h)=n e)reunw=sin ple/on,
le/gei tis ei(=s, o(\ pa/ntas e)s pe/don ka/ra
neu=sai fo/bw| prou)/treyen: ou) ga\r ei)/xomen
ou)/t' a)ntifwnei=n ou)/q' o(/pws drw=ntes kalw=s
pra/caimen. h)=n d' o( mu=qos w(s a)noiste/on
soi\ tou)/rgon ei)/h tou=to kou)xi\ krupte/on.
kai\ tau=t' e)ni/ka, ka)me\ to\n dusdai/mona
pa/los kaqairei= tou=to ta)gaqo\n labei=n.
pa/reimi d' a)/kwn ou)x e(kou=sin, oi)=d' o(/ti:
ste/rgei ga\r ou)dei\s a)/ggelon kakw=n e)pw=n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)/nac, e)moi/ toi/, mh/ ti kai\ qeh/laton
tou)/rgon to/d', h( cu/nnoia bouleu/ei pa/lai

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: pau=sai, pri\n o)rgh=s kai\ 'me\ mestw=sai le/gwn,
mh\ 'feureqh=|s a)/nous te kai\ ge/rwn a(/ma.
le/geis ga\r ou)k a)nekta\ dai/monas le/gwn
pro/noian i)/sxein tou=de tou= nekrou= pe/ri.
po/teron u(pertimw=ntes w(s eu)erge/thn
e)/krupton au)to/n, o(/stis a)mfiki/onas
naou\s purw/swn h)=lqe ka)naqh/mata
kai\ gh=n e)kei/nwn kai\ no/mous diaskedw=n;
h)\ tou\s kakou\s timw=ntas ei)sora=|s qeou/s;
ou)/k e)/stin. a)lla\ tau=ta kai\ pa/lai po/lews
a)/ndres mo/lis fe/rontes e)rro/qoun e)moi/,
krufh=| ka/ra sei/ontes, ou)d' u(po\ zugw=|
lo/fon dikai/ws ei)=xon, w(s ste/rgein e)me/.
e)k tw=nde tou/tous e)cepi/stamai kalw=s
parhgme/nous misqoi=sin ei)rga/sqai ta/de.
ou)de\n ga\r a)nqrw/poisin oi(=on a)/rguros
kako\n no/mism' e)/blaste. tou=to kai\ po/leis
porqei=, to/d' a)/ndras e)cani/sthsin do/mwn:
to/d' e)kdida/skei kai\ paralla/ssei fre/nas
xrhsta\s pro\s ai)sxra\ pra/gmat' i(/stasqai brotw=n:
panourgi/as d' e)/deicen a)nqrw/pois e)/xein
kai\ panto\s e)/rgou dusse/beian ei)de/nai.
o(/soi de\ misqarnou=ntes h)/nusan ta/de,
xro/nw| pot' e)ce/pracan w(s dou=nai di/khn.
a)ll' ei)/per i)/sxei *zeu\s e)/t' e)c e)mou= se/bas,
eu)= tou=t' e)pi/stas', o(/rkios de/ soi le/gw:
ei) mh\ to\n au)to/xeira tou=de tou= ta/fou
eu(ro/ntes e)kfanei=t' e)s o)fqalmou\s e)mou/s,

ou)x u(mi
 *(/aidhs mou=nos a)rke/sei, pri
 a)
zw=ntes kremastoi\ th/nde dhlw/shq' u(/brin,
i(/n' ei)do/tes to\ ke/rdos e)/nqen oi)ste/on

ou)k e)c a(/pantos dei= to\ kerdai/nein filei=n.
e)k tw=n ga\r ai)sxrw=n lhmma/twn tou\s plei/onas
a)twme/nous i)/dois a)\n h)\ seswsme/nous.

sp.speaker: *fu/lac
sp.l: ei)pei=n ti dw/seis h)\ strafei\s ou(/tws i)/w;

sp.speaker: *kre/wn

sp.l: e)n toi=sin w)si\n h)\ 'pi\ th=| yuxh=| da/knei;

sp.speaker: *fu/lac
sp.l: o( drw=n s' a)nia=| ta\s fre/nas, ta\ d' w)=t' e)gw/.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn

sp.speaker: *fu/lac
sp.l: ou)/koun to/ g' e)/rgon tou=to poih/sas pote/.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn

sp.speaker: *fu/lac
sp.l: feu=:
h)= deino\n w(=| dokh=| ge kai\ yeudh= dokei=n.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: ko/myeue/ nun th\n do/can: ei) de\ tau=ta mh\
fanei=te/ moi tou\s drw=ntas, e)cerei=q' o(/ti
ta\ deila\ ke/rdh phmona\s e)rga/zetai.

sp.speaker: *fu/lac
sp.l: a)ll' eu(reqei/h me\n ma/list': e)a\n de/ toi
lhfqh=| te kai\ mh/, tou=to ga\r tu/xh krinei=,
ou)k e)/sq' o(/pws o)/yei su\ deu=r' e)lqo/nta me:
kai\ nu=n ga\r e)kto\s e)lpi/dos gnw/mhs t' e)mh=s
swqei\s o)fei/lw toi=s qeoi=s pollh\n xa/rin.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: polla\ ta\ deina\ kou)de\n a)nqrw/pou deino/teron pe/lei.
tou=to kai\ poliou= pe/ran po/ntou xeimeri/w| no/tw|
xwrei=, peribruxi/oisin
perw=n u(p' oi)/dmasin.
qew=n te ta\n u(perta/tan, *ga=n
a)/fqiton, a)kama/tan, a)potru/etai
i)llome/nwn a)ro/trwn e)/tos ei)s e)/tos
i(ppei/w| ge/nei poleu/wn.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: koufono/wn te fu=lon o)rni/qwn a)mfibalw\n a)/gei
kai\ qhrw=n a)gri/wn e)/qnh po/ntou t' ei)nali/an fu/sin
spei/raisi diktuoklw/stois,
perifradh\s a)nh/r:
kratei= de\ mhxanai=s a)grau/lou
qhro\s o)ressiba/ta, lasiau/xena/ q'
i(/ppon o)xma/zetai a)mfi\ lo/fon zugw=n
ou)/reio/n t' a)kmh=ta tau=ron.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: kai\ fqe/gma kai\ a)nemo/en fro/nhma kai\ a)stuno/mous
o)rga\s e)dida/cato kai\ dusau/lwn
pa/gwn u(pai/qreia kai\ du/sombra feu/gein be/lh
pantopo/ros: a)/poros e)p' ou)de\n e)/rxetai
to\ me/llon: *(/aida mo/non feu=cin ou)k e)pa/cetai:
no/swn d' a)mhxa/nwn fuga\s cumpe/frastai.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: sofo/n ti to\ mhxano/en te/xnas u(pe\r e)lpi/d' e)/xwn
tote\ me\n kako/n, a)/llot' e)p' e)sqlo\n e(/rpei,
no/mous gerai/rwn xqono\s qew=n t' e)/norkon di/kan,
u(yi/polis: a)/polis o(/tw| to\ mh\ kalo\n
cu/nesti to/lmas xa/rin. mh/t' e)moi\ pare/stios
ge/noito mh/t' i)/son fronw=n o(\s ta/d' e)/rdei.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e)s daimo/nion te/ras a)mfinow=
to/de: pw=s ei)dw\s a)ntilogh/sw
th/nd' ou)k ei)=nai pai=d' *)antigo/nhn.
w)= du/sthnos
kai\ dusth/nou patro\s *oi)dipo/da,
ti/ pot'; ou) dh/ pou se/ g' a)pistou=san
toi=s basilei/oisin a)/gousi no/mois
kai\ e)n a)frosu/nh| kaqelo/ntes;

sp.speaker: *fu/lac
sp.l: h(/d' e)/st' e)kei/nh tou)/rgon h( 'ceirgasme/nh:

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: o(/d' e)k do/mwn a)/yorros ei)s de/on pera=|.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn

sp.speaker: *fu/lac
sp.l: a)/nac, brotoi=sin ou)de/n e)/st' a)pw/moton.
yeu/dei ga\r h( 'pi/noia th\n gnw/mhn: e)pei\
sxolh=| poq' h(/cein deu=r' a)\n e)chu/xoun e)gw\
tai=s sai=s a)peilai=s ai(=s e)xeima/sqhn to/te
a)ll' h( ga\r e)kto\s kai\ par' e)lpi/das xara\
e)/oiken a)/llh| mh=kos ou)de\n h(donh=|,
h(/kw, di' o(/rkwn kai/per w)\n a)pw/motos,
ko/rhn a)/gwn th/nd', h(\ kaqh|re/qh ta/fon
kosmou=sa. klh=ros e)nqa/d' ou)k e)pa/lleto,
a)ll' e)/st' e)mo\n qou)/rmaion, ou)k a)/llou, to/de.
kai\ nu=n, a)/nac, th/nd' au)to/s, w(s qe/leis, labw\n
kai\ kri=ne ka)ce/legx': e)gw\ d' e)leu/qeros
di/kaio/s ei)mi tw=nd' a)phlla/xqai kakw=n.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: a)/geis de\ th/nde tw=| tro/pw| po/qen labw/n;

sp.speaker: *fu/lac
sp.l: au(/th to\n a)/ndr' e)/qapte: pa/nt' e)pi/stasai.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: h)= kai\ cuni/hs kai\ le/geis o)rqw=s a(\ fh/|s;

sp.speaker: *fu/lac
sp.l:
tau/thn g' i)dw
 qa/ptousan o(
 su\ to
 nekro
a)pei=pas. a)=r' e)/ndhla kai\ safh= le/gw;

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: kai\ pw=s o(ra=tai ka)pi/lhptos h(|re/qh;

sp.speaker: *fu/lac
sp.l: toiou=ton h)=n to\ pra=gm'. o(/pws ga\r h(/komen,
pro\s sou= ta\ dei/n' e)kei=n' e)phpeilhme/noi,
pa=san ko/nin sh/rantes, h(\ katei=xe to\n
ne/kun, mudw=n te sw=ma gumnw/santes eu)=,
kaqh/meq' a)/krwn e)k pa/gwn u(ph/nemoi,
o)smh\n a)p' au)tou= mh\ ba/loi pefeugo/tes,
e)gerti\ kinw=n a)/ndr' a)nh\r e)pirro/qois
kakoi=sin, ei)/ tis tou=d' a)khdh/soi po/nou.
xro/non ta/d' h)=n tosou=ton, e)/st' e)n ai)qe/ri
me/sw| kate/sth lampro\s h(li/ou ku/klos
kai\ kau=m' e)/qalpe: kai\ to/t' e)cai/fnhs xqono\s
tufw\s a)ei/ras skhpto/n ou)ra/nion a)/xos,
pi/mplhsi pedi/on, pa=san ai)ki/zwn fo/bhn
u(/lhs pedia/dos, e)n d' e)mestw/qh me/gas
ai)qh/r: mu/santes d' ei)/xomen qei/an no/son.
kai\ tou=d' a)pallage/ntos e)n xro/nw| makrw=|,
h( pai=s o(ra=tai, ka)nakwku/ei pikra=s
o)/rniqos o)cu\n fqo/ggon, e)s o(/tan kenh=s
eu)nh=s neossw=n o)rfano\n ble/yh| le/xos.
ou(/tw de\ xau)/th, yilo\n w(s o(ra=| ne/kun,
go/oisin e)cw/|mwcen, e)k d' a)ra\s kaka\s
h)ra=to toi=si tou)/rgon e)ceirgasme/nois.
kai\ xersi\n eu)qu\s diyi/an fe/rei ko/nin,
e)/k t' eu)kroth/tou xalke/as a)/rdhn pro/xou
xoai=si trispo/ndoisi to\n ne/kun ste/fei.
xh)mei=s i)do/ntes i(e/mesqa, su\n de/ nin
qhrw/meq' eu)qu\s ou)de\n e)kpeplhgme/nhn,
kai\ ta/s te pro/sqen ta/s te nu=n h)le/gxomen
pra/ceis: a)/parnos d' ou)deno\s kaqi/stato,
a(/m' h(de/ws e)/moige ka)lgeinw=s a(/ma.
to\ me\n ga\r au)to\n e)k kakw=n pefeuge/nai
h(/diston, e)s kako\n de\ tou\s fi/lous a)/gein
a)lgeino/n: a)lla\ pa/nta tau=q' h(/ssw labei=n
e)moi\ pe/fuke th=s e)mh=s swthri/as.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: se\ dh/, se\ th\n neu/ousan ei)s pe/don ka/ra,
fh\s h)\ katarnei= mh\ dedrake/nai ta/de:

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l:
su\ me
 komi/zois a)

 h)=| qe/leis

su\ d' ei)pe/ moi mh\ mh=kos, a)lla\ sunto/mws,

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
sp.l: h)/|dh: ti/ d' ou)k e)/mellon; e)mfanh= ga\r h)=n.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: kai\ dh=t' e)to/lmas tou/sd' u(perbai/nein no/mous;

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
sp.l: ou) ga/r ti/ moi *zeu\s h)=n o( khru/cas ta/de,
ou)d' h( cu/noikos tw=n ka/tw qew=n *di/kh
toiou/sd' e)n a)nqrw/poisin w(/risen no/mous.
ou)de\ sqe/nein tosou=ton w)|o/mhn ta\ sa\
khru/gmaq', w(/st' a)/grapta ka)sfalh= qew=n
no/mima du/nasqai qnhto\n o)/nq' u(perdramei=n.
ou) ga/r ti nu=n ge ka)xqe/s, a)ll' a)ei/ pote
zh=| tau=ta, kou)dei\s oi)=den e)c o(/tou 'fa/nh.
tou/twn e)gw\ ou)k e)/mellon, a)ndro\s ou)deno\s
fro/nhma dei/sas', e)n qeoi=si th\n di/khn
dw/sein: qanoume/nh ga\r e)ch/|dh, ti/ d' ou)/;
kei) mh\ su\ prou)kh/rucas. ei) de\ tou= xro/nou
pro/sqen qanou=mai, ke/rdos au)/t' e)gw\ le/gw.
o(/stis ga\r e)n polloi=sin w(s e)gw\ kakoi=s
zh=|, pw=s o(/d' *ou)xi\ katqanw\n ke/rdos fe/rei;
ou(/tws e)/moige tou=de tou= mo/rou tuxei=n
par' ou)de\n a)/lgos: a)ll' a)/n, ei) to\n e)c e)mh=s
mhtro\s qano/nt' a)/qapton h)nsxo/mhn ne/kun,
kei/nois a)\n h)/lgoun: toi=sde d' ou)k a)lgu/nomai.
soi\ d' ei) dokw= nu=n mw=ra drw=sa tugxa/nein,
sxedo/n ti mw/rw| mwri/an o)fliska/nw.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: dhloi= to\ ge/nnhm' w)mo\n e)c w)mou= patro\s
th=s paido/s. ei)/kein d' ou)k e)pi/statai kakoi=s.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: a)ll' i)/sqi toi ta\ sklh/r' a)/gan fronh/mata
pi/ptein ma/lista, kai\ to\n e)gkrate/staton
si/dhron o)pto\n e)k puro\s periskelh=
qrausqe/nta kai\ r(age/nta plei=st' a)\n ei)si/dois:
smikrw=| xalinw=| d' oi)=da tou\s qumoume/nous
i(/ppous katartuqe/ntas: ou) ga\r e)kpe/lei
fronei=n me/g' o(/stis dou=lo/s e)sti tw=n pe/las.
au(/th d' u(bri/zein me\n to/t' e)chpi/stato,
no/mous u(perbai/nousa tou\s prokeime/nous:
u(/bris d', e)pei\ de/draken, h(/de deute/ra,
tou/tois e)pauxei=n kai\ dedrakui=an gela=n.
h)= nu=n e)gw\ me\n ou)k a)nh/r, au(/th d' a)nh/r,
ei) tau=t' a)nati\ th=|de kei/setai kra/th.
a)ll' ei)/t' a)delfh=s ei)/q' o(maimoneste/ra
tou= panto\s h(mi=n *zhno\s e(rkei/ou kurei=,
au)th/ te xh) cu/naimos ou)k a)lu/ceton
mo/rou kaki/stou: kai\ ga\r ou)=n kei/nhn i)/son
e)paitiw=mai tou=de bouleu=sai ta/fou.
kai/ nin kalei=t': e)/sw ga\r ei)=don a)rti/ws
lussw=san au)th\n ou)d' e)ph/bolon frenw=n.
filei= d' o( qumo\s pro/sqen, h(|rh=sqai klopeu\s
tw=n mhde\n o)rqw=s e)n sko/tw| texnwme/nwn:
misw= ge me/ntoi xw)/tan e)n kakoi=si/ tis
a(lou\s e)/peita tou=to kallu/nein qe/lh|.

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
sp.l: qe/leis ti mei=zon h)\ kataktei=nai/ m' e(lw/n;

sp.speaker: *kre/wn

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh

a)resto\n ou)de\n mhd' a)resqei/h pote/:
ou(/tw de\ kai\ soi\ ta)/m' a)fanda/nont' e)/fu.
kai/toi po/qen kle/os g' a)\n eu)klee/steron
kate/sxon h)\ to\n au)ta/delfon e)n ta/fw|

a)ll' h( turanni\s polla/ t' a)/ll' eu)daimonei=
ka)/cestin au)th=| dra=n le/gein q' a(\ bou/letai.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: pw=s dh=t' e)kei/nw| dussebh= tima=|s xa/rin;

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
sp.l: ou) marturh/sei tau=q' o( katqanw\n ne/kus.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: ei)/ toi/ sfe tima=|s e)c i)/sou tw=| dussebei=.

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
sp.l: ou) ga/r ti dou=los, a)ll' a)delfo\s w)/leto.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh

sp.l: a)ll' ou)x o( xrhsto\s tw=| kakw=| laxei=n i)/sos.

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
sp.l: ti/s oi)=den ei) ka/twqen eu)agh= ta/de;

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: ou)/toi poq' ou(xqro/s, ou)d' o(/tan qa/nh|, fi/los.

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
sp.l: ou)/toi sune/xqein, a)lla\ sumfilei=n e)/fun.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: ka/tw nun e)lqou=s', ei) filhte/on, fi/lei
kei/nous: e)mou= de\ zw=ntos ou)k a)/rcei gunh/.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: kai\ mh\n pro\ pulw=n h(/d' *)ismh/nh,
fila/delfa ka/tw da/kru' ei)bome/nh:
nefe/lh d' o)fru/wn u(/per ai(mato/en
r(e/qos ai)sxu/nei,
te/ggous' eu)w=pa pareia/n.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: su\ d', h(\ kat' oi)/kous w(s e)/xidn' u(feime/nh
lh/qousa/ m' e)ce/pines, ou)d' e)ma/nqanon
tre/fwn du/' a)/ta ka)panasta/seis qro/nwn,
fe/r', ei)pe\ dh/ moi, kai\ su\ tou=de tou= ta/fou
fh/seis metasxei=n, h)\ 'comei= to\ mh\ ei)de/nai;

sp.speaker: *)ismh/nh
sp.l: de/draka tou)/rgon, ei)/per h(/d' o(morroqei=
kai\ cummeti/sxw kai\ fe/rw th=s ai)ti/as.

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
sp.l: a)ll' ou)k e)a/sei tou=to/ g' h( di/kh s', e)pei\
ou)/t' h)qe/lhsas ou)/t' e)gw\ 'koinwsa/mhn.

sp.speaker: *)ismh/nh
sp.l: a)ll' e)n kakoi=s toi=s soi=sin ou)k ai)sxu/nomai
cu/mploun e)mauth\n tou= pa/qous poioume/nh.

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
sp.l: w(=n tou)/rgon, *(/aidhs xoi) ka/tw cuni/stores:
lo/gois d' e)gw\ filou=san ou) ste/rgw fi/lhn.

sp.speaker: *)ismh/nh
sp.l: mh/toi, kasignh/th, m' a)tima/sh|s to\ mh\ ou)
qanei=n te su\n soi\ to\n qano/nta q' a(gni/sai.

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
sp.l: mh/ moi qa/nh|s su\ koina\ mhd' a(\ mh\ 'qiges
poiou= seauth=s. a)rke/sw qnh/|skous' e)gw/.

sp.speaker: *)ismh/nh
sp.l: kai\ ti/s bi/os moi sou= leleimme/nh| fi/los;

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
sp.l: *kre/ont' e)rw/ta: tou=de ga\r su\ khdemw/n.

sp.speaker: *)ismh/nh
sp.l: ti/ tau=t' a)nia=|s m', ou)de\n w)feloume/nh;

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
sp.l: a)lgou=sa me\n dh=t' ei) gelw= g' e)n soi\ gelw=.

sp.speaker: *)ismh/nh
sp.l: ti/ dh=t' a)\n a)lla\ nu=n s' e)/t' w)feloi=m' e)gw/;

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
sp.l: sw=son seauth/n: ou) fqonw= s' u(pekfugei=n.

sp.speaker: *)ismh/nh
sp.l: oi)/moi ta/laina, ka)mpla/kw tou= sou= mo/rou;

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
sp.l: su\ me\n ga\r ei(/lou zh=n, e)gw\ de\ katqanei=n.

sp.speaker: *)ismh/nh
sp.l: a)ll' ou)k e)p' a)rrh/tois ge toi=s e)moi=s lo/gois.

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
sp.l: kalw=s su\ me\n toi=s, toi=s d' e)gw\ 'do/koun fronei=n.

sp.speaker: *)ismh/nh
sp.l: kai\ mh\n i)/sh nw=|n e)stin h( 'camarti/a.

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
sp.l: qa/rsei: su\ me\n zh=|s, h( d' e)mh\ yuxh\ pa/lai
te/qnhken, w(/ste toi=s qanou=sin w)felei=n.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: tw\ pai=de fhmi\ tw/de th\n me\n a)rti/ws
a)/noun pefa/nqai, th\n d' a)f' ou(= ta\ prw=t' e)/fu.

sp.speaker: *)ismh/nh
sp.l: ou) ga/r pot', w)=nac, ou)d' o(\s a)\n bla/sth| me/nei
nou=s toi=s kakw=s pra/ssousin, a)ll' e)ci/statai.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: soi\ gou=n, o(/q' ei(/lou su\n kakoi=s pra/ssein kaka/.

sp.speaker: *)ismh/nh
sp.l: ti/ ga\r mo/nh| moi th=sd' a)/ter biw/simon;

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: a)ll' h(/de me/ntoi mh\ le/g': ou) ga\r e)/st' e)/ti.

sp.speaker: *)ismh/nh
sp.l: a)lla\ ktenei=s numfei=a tou= sautou= te/knou;

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: a)rw/simoi ga\r xa)te/rwn ei)si\n gu/ai.

sp.speaker: *)ismh/nh
sp.l: ou)x w(/s g' e)kei/nw| th=|de/ t' h)=n h(rmosme/na.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: kaka\s e)gw\ gunai=kas ui(e/si stugw=.

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
sp.l: w)= fi/ltaq' *ai(=mon, w(/s s' a)tima/zei path/r.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: a)/gan ge lupei=s kai\ su\ kai\ to\ so\n le/xos.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: h)= ga\r sterh/seis th=sde to\n sautou= go/non;

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: *(/aidhs o( pau/swn tou/sde tou\s ga/mous e)/fu.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: dedogme/n', w(s e)/oike, th/nde katqanei=n.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: kai\ soi/ ge ka)moi/. mh\ triba\s e)/t', a)lla/ nin
komi/zet' ei)/sw, dmw=es: e)k de\ tou=de xrh\
gunai=kas ei)=nai ta/sde mhd' a)neime/nas.
feu/gousi ga/r toi xoi) qrasei=s, o(/tan pe/las
h)/dh to\n, *(/aidhn ei)sorw=si tou= bi/ou.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: eu)dai/mones oi(=si kakw=n a)/geustos ai)w/n.
oi(=s ga\r a)\n seisqh=| qeo/qen do/mos, a)/tas
ou)de\n e)llei/pei genea=s e)pi\ plh=qos e(/rpon:
o(/moion w(/ste ponti/ais oi)=dma duspno/ois o(/tan
*qrh/|ssaisin e)/rebos u(/falon e)pidra/mh| pnoai=s,
kuli/ndei busso/qen kelaina\n qi=na kai\
dusa/nemoi, sto/nw| bre/mousi d' a)ntiplh=ges a)ktai/.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)rxai=a ta\ *labdakida=n oi)/kwn o(rw=mai
ph/mata fqitw=n e)pi\ ph/masi pi/ptont',
ou)d' a)palla/ssei genea\n ge/nos, a)ll' e)rei/pei
qew=n tis, ou)d' e)/xei lu/sin. nu=n ga\r e)sxa/tas u(/per
r(i/zas o(\ te/tato fa/os e)n *oi)di/pou do/mois,
kat' au)= nin foini/a qew=n tw=n nerte/rwn
a)ma=| ko/nis lo/gou t' a)/noia kai\ frenw=n e)rinu/s.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: tea/n, *zeu=, du/nasin ti/s a)ndrw=n u(perbasi/a kata/sxoi;
ta\n ou)/q' u(/pnos ai(rei= poq' o( pa/nt' a)greu/wn,
ou)/te qew=n a)/kmatoi mh=nes, a)gh/rw| de\ xro/nw|
duna/stas kate/xeis *)olu/mpou marmaro/essan ai)/glan.
to/ t' e)/peita kai\ to\ me/llon
kai\ to\ pri\n e)parke/sei
no/mos o(/d', ou)de\n e(/rpei
qnatw=n bio/tw| pa/mpolu/ g' e)kto\s a)/tas.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a( ga\r dh\ polu/plagktos e)lpi\s polloi=s me\n o)/nasis a)ndrw=n,
polloi=s d' a)pa/ta koufono/wn e)rw/twn:
ei)do/ti d' ou)de\n e(/rpei, pri\n puri\ qermw=| po/da tis
prosau/sh|. sofi/a| ga\r e)/k tou kleino\n e)/pos pe/fantai.
to\ kako\n dokei=n pot' e)sqlo\n
tw=|d' e)/mmen o(/tw| fre/nas
qeo\s a)/gei pro\s a)/tan:

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: pra/ssei d' o)li/giston xro/non e)kto\s a)/tas.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: o(/de mh\n *ai(/mwn, pai/dwn tw=n sw=n
ne/aton ge/nnhm': a)=r' a)xnu/menos
ta/lidos h(/kei mo/ron *)antigo/nhs,
a)pa/ths lexe/wn u(peralgw=n;

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: ta/x' ei)so/mesqa ma/ntewn u(pe/rteron.
w)= pai=, telei/an yh=fon a)=ra mh\ klu/wn
th=s mellonu/mfou patri\ lussai/nwn pa/rei;
h)\ soi\ me\n h(mei=s pantaxh=|, drw=ntes fi/loi;

sp.speaker: *ai(/mwn
sp.l: pa/ter, so/s ei)mi, kai\ su/ moi gnw/mas e)/xwn
xrhsta\s a)porqoi=s, ai(=s e)/gwg' e)fe/yomai.
e)moi\ ga\r ou)dei\s a)ciw/setai ga/mos
mei/zwn fe/resqai sou= kalw=s h(goume/nou.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: ou(/tw ga/r, w)= pai=, xrh\ dia\ ste/rnwn e)/xein,
gnw/mhs patrw/|as pa/nt' o)/pisqen e(sta/nai.
tou/tou ga\r ou(/nek' a)/ndres eu)/xontai gona\s
kathko/ous fu/santes e)n do/mois e)/xein,
w(s kai\ to\n e)xqro\n a)ntamu/nwntai kakoi=s
kai\ to\n fi/lon timw=sin e)c i)/sou patri/.
o(/stis d' a)nwfe/lhta fitu/ei te/kna,
ti/ to/nd' a)\n ei)/pois a)/llo plh\n au(tw=| po/nous
fu=sai, polu\n de\ toi=sin e)xqroi=sin ge/lwn;
mh/ nu/n pot', w)= pai=, ta\s fre/nas u(f' h(donh=s
gunaiko\s ou(/nek' e)kba/lh|s, ei)dw\s o(/ti
yuxro\n paragka/lisma tou=to gi/gnetai,
gunh\ kakh\ cu/neunos e)n do/mois. ti/ ga\r
ge/noit' a)\n e(/lkos mei=zon h)\ fi/los kako/s;
a)lla\ ptu/sas w(sei/ te dusmenh= me/qes
th\n pai=d' e)n *ai)/dou th/nde numfeu/ein tini/.
e)pei\ ga\r au)th\n ei(=lon e)mfanw=s e)gw\
po/lews a)pisth/sasan e)k pa/shs mo/nhn,
yeudh= g' e)mauto\n ou) katasth/sw po/lei,
a)lla\ ktenw=. pro\s tau=t' e)fumnei/tw *di/a
cu/naimon. ei) ga\r dh\ ta/ g' e)ggenh= fu/sei
a)/kosma qre/yw, ka/rta tou\s e)/cw ge/nous
e)n toi=s ga\r oi)kei/oisin o(/stis e)/st' a)nh\r
xrhsto/s, fanei=tai ka)n po/lei di/kaios w)/n.
o(/stis d' u(perba\s h)\ no/mous bia/zetai
h)\ tou)pita/ssein toi=s kratu/nousin noei=,
ou)k e)/st' e)pai/nou tou=ton e)c e)mou= tuxei=n.
a)ll' o(\n po/lis sth/seie tou=de xrh\ klu/ein
kai\ smikra\ kai\ di/kaia kai\ ta)nanti/a.
kai\ tou=ton a)\n to\n a)/ndra qarsoi/hn e)gw\
kalw=s me\n a)/rxein, eu)= d' a)\n a)/rxesqai qe/lein,
doro/s t' a)\n e)n xeimw=ni prostetagme/non
me/nein di/kaion ka)gaqo\n parasta/thn.
a)narxi/as de\ mei=zon ou)k e)/stin kako/n.
au(/th po/leis o)/llusin, h(/d' a)nasta/tous
oi)/kous ti/qhsin, h(/de summa/xou doro\s
tropa\s katarrh/gnusi: tw=n d' o)rqoume/nwn
sw/|zei ta\ polla\ sw/maq' h( peiqarxi/a.
ou(/tws a)munte/' e)sti\ toi=s kosmoume/nois,
kou)/toi gunaiko\s ou)damw=s h(sshte/a.
krei=sson ga/r, ei)/per dei=, pro\s a)ndro\s e)kpesei=n,
kou)k a)\n gunaikw=n h(/ssones kaloi/meq' a)/n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: h(mi=n me/n, ei) mh\ tw=| xro/nw| kekle/mmeqa,
le/gein fronou/ntws w(=n le/geis dokei=s pe/ri.

sp.speaker: *ai(/mwn
sp.l: pa/ter, qeoi\ fu/ousin a)nqrw/pois fre/nas,
pa/ntwn o(/s' e)sti\ kthma/twn u(pe/rtaton.
e)gw\ d' o(/pws su\ mh\ le/geis o)rqw=s ta/de,
ou)/t' a)\n dunai/mhn mh/t' e)pistai/mhn le/gein.
ge/noito menta)\n xa)te/rw| kalw=s e)/xon.
sou= d' ou)=n pe/fuka pa/nta proskopei=n o(/sa
le/gei tis h)\ pra/ssei tis h)\ ye/gein e)/xei.
to\ ga\r so\n o)/mma deino\n, a)ndri\ dhmo/th|
lo/gois toiou/tois, oi(=s su\ mh\ te/ryei klu/wn:
e)moi\ d' a)kou/ein e)/sq' u(po\ sko/tou ta/de,
th\n pai=da tau/thn oi(=', o)du/retai po/lis,
pasw=n gunaikw=n w(s a)naciwta/th
ka/kist' a)p' e)/rgwn eu)kleesta/twn fqi/nei.
h(/tis to\n au(th=s au)ta/delfon e)n fonai=s
peptw=t' a)/qapton mh/q' u(p' w)mhstw=n kunw=n
ei)/as' o)le/sqai mh/q' u(p' oi)wnw=n tinos.
ou)x h(/de xrush=s a)ci/a timh=s laxei=n;
toia/d' e)remnh\ si=g' e)pe/rxetai fa/tis.
e)moi\ de\ sou= pra/ssontos eu)tuxw=s, pa/ter,
ou)k e)/stin ou)de\n kth=ma timiw/teron,
ti/ ga\r patro\s qa/llontos eu)klei/as te/knois
a)/galma mei=zon, h)\ ti/ pro\s pai/dwn patri/;
mh/ nun e(\n h)=qos mou=non e)n sautw=| fo/rei,
w(s fh\s su/, kou)de\n a)/llo, tou=t' o)rqw=s e)/xein.
o(/stis ga\r au)to\s h)\ fronei=n mo/nos dokei=,
h)\ glw=ssan, h(\n ou)k a)/llos, h)\ yuxh\n e)/xein,
ou(=toi diaptuxqe/ntes w)/fqhsan kenoi/.
a)ll' a)/ndra, kei)/ tis h)=| sofo/s, to\ manqa/nein
po/ll', ai)sxro\n ou)de\n kai\ to\ mh\ tei/nein a)/gan.
o(ra=|s para\ r(ei/qroisi xeima/rrois o(/sa
de/ndrwn u(pei/kei, klw=nas w(s e)ksw/|zetai,
ta\ d' a)ntitei/nont' au)to/premn' a)po/llutai.
au(/tws de\ nao\s o(/stis e)gkrath= po/da
tei/nas u(pei/kei mhde/n, u(pti/ois ka/tw
stre/yas to\ loipo\n se/lmasin nauti/lletai.
a)ll' ei)=ke kai\ qumw=| meta/stasin di/dou.
gnw/mh ga\r ei)/ tis ka)p' e)mou= newte/rou
pro/sesti, fh/m' e)/gwge presbeu/ein polu\
fu=nai to\n a)/ndra pa/nt' e)pisth/mhs ple/wn:
ei) d' ou)=n, filei= ga\r tou=to mh\ tau/th| r(e/pein,
kai\ tw=n lego/ntwn eu)= kalo\n to\ manqa/nein.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)/nac, se/ t' ei)ko/s, ei)/ ti kai/rion le/gei,
maqei=n, se/ t' au)= tou=d': eu)= ga\r ei)/rhtai diplh=|.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: oi( thlikoi/de kai\ didaco/mesqa dh\
fronei=n u(p' a)ndro\s thlikou=de th\n fu/sin;

sp.speaker: *ai(/mwn
sp.l: mhde\n to\ mh\ di/kaion: ei) d' e)gw\ ne/os,
ou) to\n xro/non xrh\ ma=llon h)\ ta)/rga skopei=n.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: e)/rgon ga/r e)sti tou\s a)kosmou=ntas se/bein;

sp.speaker: *ai(/mwn
sp.l: ou)d' a)\n keleu/saim', eu)sebei=n ei)s tou\s kakou/s.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: ou)x h(/de ga\r toia=|d' e)pei/lhptai no/sw|;

sp.speaker: *ai(/mwn
sp.l: ou)/ fhsi *qh/bhs th=sd' o(mo/ptolis lew/s.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: po/lis ga\r h(mi=n a(me\ xrh\ ta/ssein e)rei=;

sp.speaker: *ai(/mwn
sp.l: o(ra=|s to/d' w(s ei)/rhkas w(s a)/gan ne/os;

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: a)/llw| ga\r h)\ 'moi\ xrh/ me th=sd' a)/rxein xqono/s;

sp.speaker: *ai(/mwn
sp.l: po/lis ga\r ou)k e)/sq' h(/tis a)ndro/s e)sq' e(no/s.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: ou) tou= kratou=ntos h( po/lis nomi/zetai;

sp.speaker: *ai(/mwn
sp.l: kalw=s g' e)rh/mhs a)\n su\ gh=s a)/rxois mo/nos.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: o(/d', w(s e)/oike, th=| gunaiki\ summaxei=.

sp.speaker: *ai(/mwn
sp.l: ei)/per gunh\ su/. sou= ga\r ou)=n prokh/domai.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: w)= pagka/kiste, dia\ di/khs i)w\n patri/;

sp.speaker: *ai(/mwn
sp.l: ou) ga\r di/kaia/ s' e)camarta/nonq' o(rw=.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: a(marta/nw ga\r ta\s e)ma\s a)rxa\s se/bwn;

sp.speaker: *ai(/mwn
sp.l: ou) ga\r se/beis tima/s ge ta\s qew=n patw=n.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: w)= miaro\n h)=qos kai\ gunaiko\s u(/steron.

sp.speaker: *ai(/mwn
sp.l: ou)/ ta)\n e(/lois h(/ssw ge tw=n ai)sxrw=n e)me/.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: o( gou=n lo/gos soi pa=s u(pe\r kei/nhs o(/de.

sp.speaker: *ai(/mwn
sp.l: kai\ sou= ge ka)mou=, kai\ qew=n tw=n nerte/rwn.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: tau/thn pot' ou)k e)/sq' w(s e)/ti zw=san gamei=s.

sp.speaker: *ai(/mwn
sp.l: h(\ d' ou)=n qanei=tai kai\ qanou=s' o)lei= tina.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: h)= ka)papeilw=n w(=d' e)pece/rxei qrasu/s;

sp.speaker: *ai(/mwn
sp.l: ti/s d' e)/st' a)peilh\ pro\s kena\s gnw/mas le/gein;

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: klai/wn frenw/seis, w)\n frenw=n au)to\s keno/s.

sp.speaker: *ai(/mwn
sp.l: ei) mh\ path\r h)=sq', ei)=pon a)/n s' ou)k eu)= fronei=n.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: gunaiko\s w)\n dou/leuma mh\ kw/tille/ me.

sp.speaker: *ai(/mwn
sp.l: bou/lei le/gein ti kai\ le/gwn mhde\n klu/ein;

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: a)/lhqes; a)ll' ou) to/nd' *)/olumpon, i)/sq' o(/ti,
xai/rwn e)pi\ yo/goisi denna/seis e)me/.
a)/gage to\ mi=sos w(s kat' o)/mmat' au)ti/ka
paro/nti qnh/|skh| plhsi/a tw=| numfi/w|.

sp.speaker: *ai(/mwn
sp.l: ou) dh=t' e)/moige, tou=to mh\ do/ch|s pote/,
ou)/q' h(/d' o)lei=tai plhsi/a, su/ t' ou)dama\
tou)mo\n proso/yei kra=t' e)n o)fqalmoi=s o(rw=n,
w(s toi=s qe/lousi tw=n fi/lwn mai/nh| sunw/n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a(nh/r, a)/nac, be/bhken e)c o)rgh=s taxu/s:
nou=s d' e)sti\ thlikou=tos a)lgh/sas baru/s.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: dra/tw: fronei/tw mei=zon h)\ kat' a)/ndr' i)w/n:
tw\ d' ou)=n ko/ra tw/d' ou)k a)palla/cei mo/rou.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)/mfw ga\r au)tw\ kai\ kataktei=nai noei=s;

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: ou) th/n ge mh\ qigou=san: eu)= ga\r ou)=n le/geis.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: mo/rw| de\ poi/w| kai/ sfe bouleu/ei ktanei=n;

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: a)/gwn e)/rhmos e)/nq' a)\n h)=| brotw=n sti/bos
kru/yw petrw/dei zw=san e)n katw/ruxi,
forbh=s tosou=ton w(s a)/gos mo/non proqei/s,
o(/pws mi/asma pa=s' u(pekfu/gh| po/lis.
ka)kei= to\n *(/aidhn, o(\n mo/non se/bei qew=n,
ai)toume/nh pou teu/cetai to\ mh\ qanei=n,
h)\ gnw/setai gou=n a)lla\ thnikau=q' o(/ti
po/nos perisso/s e)sti ta)n *(/aidou se/bein.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: *)/erws a)ni/kate ma/xan, *)/erws, o(\s e)n kth/masi pi/pteis,
o(\s e)n malakai=s pareiai=s nea/nidos e)nnuxeu/eis,
foita=|s d' u(perpo/ntios e)/n t' a)grono/mois au)lai=s:
kai/ s' ou)/t' a)qana/twn fu/cimos ou)dei\s
ou)/q' a(meri/wn se/ g' a)nqrw/pwn. o( d' e)/xwn me/mhnen.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: su\ kai\ dikai/wn a)di/kous fre/nas paraspa=|s e)pi\ lw/ba|,
su\ kai\ to/de nei=kos a)ndrw=n cu/naimon e)/xeis tara/cas:
nika=| d' e)nargh\s blefa/rwn i(/meros eu)le/ktrou
nu/mfas, tw=n mega/lwn pa/redros e)n a)rxai=s
qesmw=n. a)/maxos ga\r e)mpai/zei qeo\s, *)afrodi/ta.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: nu=n d' h)/dh 'gw\ kau)to\s qesmw=n
e)/cw fe/romai ta/d' o(rw=n i)/sxein d'
ou)ke/ti phga\s du/namai da/kru
to\n pagkoi/thn o(/q' o(rw= qa/lamon
th/nd' *)antigo/nhn a)nu/tousan.

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
sp.l: o(ra=t' e)/m', w)= ga=s patri/as poli=tai, ta\n nea/tan o(do\n
stei/xousan, ne/aton de\ fe/ggos leu/ssousan a)eli/ou,
kou)/pot' au)=qis. a)lla/ m' o( pagkoi/tas *(/aidas zw=san a)/gei
ta\n *)axe/rontos
a)kta/n, ou)/q' u(menai/wn e)/gklhron, ou)/t' e)pinu/mfeio/s
pw/ me/ tis u(/mnos u(/mnhsen, a)ll' *)axe/ronti numfeu/sw.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ou)kou=n kleinh\ kai\ e)/painon e)/xous'
e)s to/d' a)pe/rxei keu=qos neku/wn,
ou)/te fqina/sin plhgei=sa no/sois
ou)/te cife/wn e)pi/xeira laxou=s',
a)ll' au)to/nomos zw=sa mo/nh dh\
qnhtw=n *(/aidhn katabh/sei.

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
sp.l: h)/kousa dh\ lugro/taton o)le/sqai ta\n *frugi/an ce/nan
*tanta/lou *sipu/lw| pro\s a)/krw|, ta\n kisso\s w(s a)tenh\s
petrai/a bla/sta da/masen, kai/ nin o)/mbroi takome/nan,
w(s fa/tis a)ndrw=n,
xiw/n t' ou)dama\ lei/pei, te/ggei d' u(p' o)fru/si pagklau/tois
deira/das: a(=| me dai/mwn o(moiota/tan kateuna/zei.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)lla\ qeo/s toi kai\ qeogennh/s,
h(mei=s de\ brotoi\ kai\ qnhtogenei=s.
kai/toi fqime/nh| me/ga ka)kou=sai
toi=s i)soqe/ois su/gklhra laxei=n.
zw=san kai\ e)/peita qanou=san.

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
sp.l: oi)/moi gelw=mai. ti/ me, pro\s qew=n patrw/|wn.
ou)k oi)xome/nan u(bri/zeis, a)ll' e)pi/fanton;
w)= po/lis, w)= po/lews polukth/mones a)/ndres:
i)w\ *dirkai=ai krh=nai
*qh/bas t' eu)arma/tou a)/lsos, e)/mpas cumma/rturas u)/mm' e)piktw=mai,
oi(/a fi/lwn a)/klautos, oi(/ois no/mois
pro\s e(/rgma tumbo/xwston e)/rxomai ta/fou potaini/ou:
i)w\ du/stanos, brotoi=s ou)/te nekroi=s kurou=sa
me/toikos ou) zw=sin, ou) qanou=sin.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: proba=s' e)p' e)/sxaton qra/sous
u(yhlo\n e)s *di/kas ba/qron
prose/peses, w)= te/knon, polu/:
patrw=|on d' e)kti/neis tin' a)=qlon.

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
sp.l: e)/yausas a)lgeinota/tas e)moi\ meri/mnas,
patro\s tripo/liston oi)=kton tou/ te pro/pantos
a(mete/rou po/tmou kleinoi=s *labdaki/daisin.
i)w\ matrw=|ai le/ktrwn
a)=tai koimh/mata/ t' au)toge/nnht' e)mw=| patri\ dusmo/rou matro/s,
oi(/wn e)gw/ poq' a( talai/frwn e)/fun:
pro\s ou(\s a)rai=os a)/gamos a(/d' e)gw\ me/toikos e)/rxomai.
i)w\ duspo/tmwn kasi/gnhte ga/mwn kurh/sas,
qanw\n e)/t' ou)=san kath/nare/s me.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: se/bein me\n eu)se/beia/ tis,
kra/tos d' o(/tw| kra/tos me/lei
parabato\n ou)dama=| pe/lei:
se\ d' au)to/gnwtos w)/les' o)rga/.

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
sp.l: a)/klautos, a)/filos, a)nume/naios talai/frwn a)/gomai
ta\n puma/tan o(do/n. ou)ke/ti moi to/de
lampa/dos i(ero\n o)/mma
qe/mis o(ra=n talai/na|.
to\n d' e)mo\n po/tmon a)da/kruton
ou)dei\s fi/lwn stena/zei.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: a)=r' i)/st', a)oida\s kai\ go/ous pro\ tou= qanei=n
w(s ou)d' a)\n ei(=s pau/sait' a)/n, ei) xrei/h le/gein;
ou)k a)/ceq' w(s ta/xista; kai\ kathrefei=
tu/mbw| periptu/cantes, w(s ei)/rhk' e)gw/,
a)/fete mo/nhn e)/rhmon, ei)/te xrh=| qanei=n
ei)/t' e)n toiau/th| zw=sa tumbeu/ein ste/gh|:
h(mei=s ga\r a(gnoi\ tou)pi\ th/nde th\n ko/rhn
metoiki/as d' ou)=n th=s a)/nw sterh/setai.

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
sp.l: w)= tu/mbos, w)= numfei=on, w)= kataskafh\s
oi)/khsis a)ei/frouros, oi(= poreu/omai
pro\s tou\s e)mauth=s, w(=n a)riqmo\n e)n nekroi=s
plei=ston de/dektai *ferse/fass' o)lwlo/twn:
w(=n loisqi/a 'gw\ kai\ ka/kista dh\ makrw=|
ka/teimi, pri/n moi moi=ran e)ch/kein bi/ou.
e)lqou=sa me/ntoi ka/rt' e)n e)lpi/sin tre/fw
fi/lh me\n h(/cein patri/, prosfilh\s de\ soi/,
mh=ter, fi/lh de\ soi/, kasi/gnhton ka/ra:
e)pei\ qano/ntas au)to/xeir u(ma=s e)gw\
e)/lousa ka)ko/smhsa ka)pitumbi/ous
xoa\s e)/dwka. nu=n de/ *polu/neikes, to\ so\n
de/mas periste/llousa toia/d' a)/rnumai.
kai/toi s' e)gw\ 'ti/mhsa toi=s fronou=sin eu)=.
ou) ga/r pot' ou)/t' a)/n, ei) te/knwn mh/thr e)/fun,
ou)/t' ei) po/sis moi katqanw\n e)th/keto,
bi/a| politw=n to/nd' a)\n h)|ro/mhn po/non.
ti/nos no/mou dh\ tau=ta pro\s xa/rin le/gw;
po/sis me\n a)/n moi katqano/ntos a)/llos h)=n,
kai\ pai=s a)p' a)/llou fwto/s, ei) tou=d' h)/mplakon,
mhtro\s d' e)n *(/aidou kai\ patro\s kekeuqo/toin
ou)k e)/st' a)delfo\s o(/stis a)\n bla/stoi pote/.
toiw=|de me/ntoi s' e)kprotimh/sas' e)gw\
no/mw| *kre/onti tau=t' e)/doc' a(marta/nein
kai\ deina\ tolma=n, w)= kasi/gnhton ka/ra.
kai\ nu=n a)/gei me dia\ xerw=n ou(/tw labw\n
a)/lektron, a)nume/naion, ou)/te tou ga/mou
me/ros laxou=san ou)/te paidei/ou trofh=s,
a)ll' w(=d' e)/rhmos pro\s fi/lwn h( du/smoros
zw=s' ei)s qano/ntwn e)/rxomai kataskafa/s.
poi/an parecelqou=sa daimo/nwn di/khn;
ti/ xrh/ me th\n du/sthnon e)s qeou\s e)/ti
ble/pein; ti/n' au)da=n cumma/xwn; e)pei/ ge dh\
th\n dusse/beian eu)sebou=s', e)kthsa/mhn.
a)ll' ei) me\n ou)=n ta/d' e)sti\n e)n qeoi=s kala/,
paqo/ntes a)\n cuggnoi=men h(marthko/tes:
ei) d' oi(/d' a(marta/nousi, mh\ plei/w kaka\
pa/qoien h)\ kai\ drw=sin e)kdi/kws e)me/.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e)/ti tw=n au)tw=n a)ne/mwn au(tai\
yuxh=s r(ipai\ th/nde g' e)/xousin.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: toiga\r tou/twn toi=sin a)/gousin
klau/maq' u(pa/rcei braduth=tos u(/per.

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
sp.l: oi)/moi, qana/tou tou=t' e)gguta/tw
tou)/pos a)fi=ktai.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: qarsei=n ou)de\n paramuqou=mai
mh\ ou) ta/de tau/th| katakurou=sqai.

sp.speaker: *)antigo/nh
sp.l: w)= gh=s *qh/bhs a)/stu patrw=|on
kai\ qeoi\ progenei=s,
a)/gomai dh\ kou)ke/ti me/llw.
leu/ssete, *qh/bhs oi( koirani/dai
th\n basileida=n mou/nhn loiph/n,
oi(=a pro\s oi(/wn a)ndrw=n pa/sxw,
th\n eu)sebi/an sebi/sasa.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e)/tla kai\ *dana/as ou)ra/nion fw=s
a)lla/cai de/mas e)n xalkode/tois au)lai=s:
kruptome/na d' e)n tumbh/rei qala/mw| katezeu/xqh:
kai/toi kai\ genea=| ti/mios, w)= pai= pai=,
kai\ *zhno\s tamieu/eske gona\s xrusoru/tous.
a)ll' a( moiridi/a tis du/nasis deina/:
ou)/t' a)/n nin o)/lbos ou)/t' *)/arhs, ou) pu/rgos, ou)x a(li/ktupoi
kelainai\ na=es e)kfu/goien.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: zeu/xqh d' o)cu/xolos pai=s o( *dru/antos,
*)hdwnw=n basileu/s, kertomi/ois o)rgai=s
e)k *dionu/sou petrw/dei kata/farktos e)n desmw=|.
ou(/tw ta=s mani/as deino\n a)posta/zei
a)nqhro/n te me/nos. kei=nos e)pe/gnw mani/ais
yau/wn to\n qeo\n e)n kertomi/ois glw/ssais.
pau/eske me\n ga\r e)nqe/ous gunai=kas eu)/io/n te pu=r,
filau/lous t' h)re/qize *mou/sas.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: para\ de\ kuanea=n pela/gei didu/mas a(lo\s
a)ktai\ *bospo/riai h(/d' o( *qrh|kw=n a)/cenos
*salmudhsso/s, i(/n' a)gxi/ptolis *)/arhs
dissoi=si *finei/dais
ei)=den a)rato\n e(/lkos
tuflwqe\n e)c a)gri/as da/martos
a)lao\n a)lasto/roisin o)mma/twn ku/klois
a)raxqe/ntwn, u(f' ai(mathrai=s
xei/ressi kai\ kerki/dwn a)kmai=sin.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: kata\ de\ tako/menoi me/leoi mele/an pa/qan
klai=on, matro\s e)/xontes a)nu/mfeuton gona/n:
a( de\ spe/rma me\n a)rxaiogo/nwn
a)/ntas' *)erexqeida=n,
thlepo/rois d' e)n a)/ntrois
tra/fh que/llaisin e)n patrw/|ais
*borea\s a(/mippos o)rqo/podos u(pe\r pa/gou
qew=n pai=s. a)lla\ ka)p' e)kei/na|
*moi=rai makrai/wnes e)/sxon, w)= pai=.

sp.speaker: *teiresi/as
sp.l: *qh/bhs a)/naktes, h(/komen koinh\n o(do\n
du/' e)c e(no\s ble/ponte: toi=s tufloi=si ga\r
au(/th ke/leuqos e)k prohghtou= pe/lei.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: ti/ d' e)/stin, w)= geraie\ *teiresi/a, ne/on;

sp.speaker: *teiresi/as
sp.l: e)gw\ dida/cw, kai\ su\ tw=| ma/ntei piqou=.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: ou)/koun pa/ros ge sh=s a)pesta/toun freno/s.

sp.speaker: *teiresi/as
sp.l: toiga\r di' o)rqh=s th/nd' e)nauklh/reis po/lin.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: e)/xw peponqw\s marturei=n o)nh/sima.

sp.speaker: *teiresi/as
sp.l: fro/nei bebw\s au)= nu=n e)pi\ curou= tu/xhs.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: ti/ d' e)/stin; w(s e)gw\ to\ so\n fri/ssw sto/ma.

sp.speaker: *teiresi/as
sp.l: gnw/sei, te/xnhs shmei=a th=s e)mh=s klu/wn.
ei)s ga\r palaio\n qa=kon o)rniqosko/pon
i(/zwn, i(/n' h)=n moi panto\s oi)wnou= limh/n,
a)gnw=t' a)kou/w fqo/ggon o)rni/qwn, kakw=|
kla/zontas oi)/strw| kai\ bebarbarwme/nw|.
kai\ spw=ntas e)n xhlai=sin a)llh/lous fonai=s
e)/gnwn: pterw=n ga\r r(oi=bdos ou)k a)/shmos h)=n.
eu)qu\s de\ dei/sas e)mpu/rwn e)geuo/mhn
bwmoi=si pamfle/ktoisin: e)k de\ quma/twn
*(/hfaistos ou)k e)/lampen, a)ll' e)pi\ spodw=|
mudw=sa khki\s mhri/wn e)th/keto
ka)/tufe ka)ne/ptue, kai\ meta/rsioi
xolai\ diespei/ronto, kai\ katarruei=s
mhroi\ kalupth=s e)ce/keinto pimelh=s.
toiau=ta paido\s tou=d' e)ma/nqanon pa/ra,
fqi/nont' a)sh/mwn o)rgi/wn manteu/mata.
e)moi\ ga\r ou(=tos h(gemw/n, a)/llois d' e)gw/.
kai\ tau=ta th=s sh=s e)k freno\s nosei= po/lis.
bwmoi\ ga\r h(mi=n e)sxa/rai te pantelei=s
plh/reis u(p' oi)wnw=n te kai\ kunw=n bora=s
tou= dusmo/rou peptw=tos *oi)di/pou go/nou.
ka)=|t' ou) de/xontai qusta/das lita\s e)/ti
qeoi\ par' h(mw=n ou)de\ mhri/wn flo/ga,
ou)d' o)/rnis eu)sh/mous a)porroibdei= boa/s
a)ndrofqo/rou bebrw=tes ai(/matos li/pos.
tau=t' ou)=n, te/knon, fro/nhson. a)nqrw/poisi ga\r
toi=s pa=si koino/n e)sti tou)camarta/nein:
e)pei\ d' a(ma/rth|, kei=nos ou)ke/t' e)/st' a)nh\r
a)/boulos ou)d' a)/nolbos, o(/stis e)s kako\n
pesw\n a)kh=tai mhd' a)ki/nhtos pe/lh|.
au)qadi/a toi skaio/tht' o)fliska/nei.
a)ll' ei)=ke tw=| qano/nti mhd' o)lwlo/ta
ke/ntei: ti/s a)lkh\ to\n qano/nt' e)piktanei=n;
eu)= soi fronh/sas eu)= le/gw. to\ manqa/nein d'
h(/diston eu)= le/gontos, ei) ke/rdos le/goi.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: w)= pre/sbu, pa/ntes w(/ste toco/tai skopou=
toceu/et' a)ndro\s tou=de, kou)de\ mantikh=s
a)/praktos u(mi=n ei)mi: tw=n d' u(pai\ ge/nous
e)chmpo/lhmai ka)mpefo/rtismai pa/lai.
kerdai/net', e)mpola=te ta)po\ *sa/rdewn
h)/lektron, ei) bou/lesqe, kai\ to\n *)indiko\n
xruso/n: ta/fw| d' e)kei=non ou)xi\ kru/yete,
ou)d' ei) qe/lous', oi( *zhno\s ai)etoi\ bora\n
fe/rein nin a(rpa/zontes e)s *dio\s qro/nous,
ou)d' w(\s mi/asma tou=to mh\ tre/sas e)gw\
qa/ptein parh/sw kei=non: eu)= ga\r oi)=d' o(/ti
qeou\s miai/nein ou)/tis a)nqrw/pwn sqe/nei.
pi/ptousi d', w)= geraie\ *teiresi/a, brotw=n
xoi) polla\ deinoi\ ptw/mat' ai)/sxr', o(/tan lo/gous
ai)sxrou\s kalw=s le/gwsi tou= ke/rdous xa/rin.

sp.speaker: *teiresi/as
sp.l: feu=.
a)=r' oi)=den a)nqrw/pwn tis, a)=ra fra/zetai,

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: ti/ xrh=ma; poi=on tou=to pa/gkoinon le/geis;

sp.speaker: *teiresi/as
sp.l: o(/sw| kra/tiston kthma/twn eu)bouli/a;

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: o(/sw|per, oi)=mai, mh\ fronei=n plei/sth bla/bh.

sp.speaker: *teiresi/as
sp.l: tau/ths su\ me/ntoi th=s no/sou plh/rhs e)/fus.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: ou) bou/lomai to\n ma/ntin a)nteipei=n kakw=s.

sp.speaker: *teiresi/as
sp.l: kai\ mh\n le/geis, yeudh= me qespi/zein le/gwn.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: to\ mantiko\n ga\r pa=n fila/rguron ge/nos.

sp.speaker: *teiresi/as
sp.l: to\ d' e)k tura/nnwn ai)sxroke/rdeian filei=.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: a)=r' oi)=sqa tagou\s o)/ntas a(\n le/gh|s le/gwn;

sp.speaker: *teiresi/as
sp.l: oi)=d': e)c e)mou= ga\r th/nd' e)/xeis sw/sas po/lin.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: sofo\s su\ ma/ntis, a)lla\ ta)dikei=n filw=n.

sp.speaker: *teiresi/as
sp.l: o)/rseis me ta)ki/nhta dia\ frenw=n fra/sai.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: ki/nei, mo/non de\ mh\ 'pi\ ke/rdesin le/gwn.

sp.speaker: *teiresi/as
sp.l: ou(/tw ga\r h)/dh kai\ dokw= to\ so\n me/ros.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: w(s mh\ 'mpolh/swn i)/sqi th\n e)mh\n fre/na.

sp.speaker: *teiresi/as
sp.l: a)ll' eu)= ge/ toi ka/tisqi mh\ pollou\s e)/ti
tro/xous a(millhth=ras h(li/ou telei=n,
e)n oi(=si tw=n sw=n au)to\s e)k spla/gxnwn e(/na
ne/kun nekrw=n a)moibo\n a)ntidou\s e)/sei,
a)nq' w(=n e)/xeis me\n tw=n a)/nw balw\n ka/tw
yuxh/n t' a)ti/mws e)n ta/fw| katw/|kisas,
e)/xeis de\ tw=n ka/twqen e)nqa/d' au)= qew=n
a)/moiron, a)kte/riston, a)no/sion ne/kun.
w(=n ou)/te soi\ me/testin ou)/te toi=s a)/nw
qeoi=sin, a)ll' e)k sou= bia/zontai ta/de.
tou/twn se lwbhth=res u(sterofqo/roi
loxw=sin *(/aidou kai\ qew=n *)erinu/es,
e)n toi=sin au)toi=s toi=sde lhfqh=nai kakoi=s.
kai\ tau=t' a)/qrhson ei) kathrgurwme/nos
le/gw: fanei= ga\r ou) makrou= xro/nou tribh\
a)ndrw=n gunaikw=n soi=s do/mois kwku/mata.
e)xqrai\ de\ pa=sai suntara/ssontai po/leis,
o(/swn spara/gmat' h)\ ku/nes kaqh/gnisan
h)\ qh=res h)/ tis pthno\s oi)wno/s, fe/rwn
a)no/sion o)smh\n e(stiou=xon e)s po/lin.
toiau=ta/ sou, lupei=s ga/r, w(/ste toco/ths
a)fh=ka qumw=|, kardi/as toceu/mata
be/baia, tw=n su\ qa/lpos ou)x u(pekdramei=.
w)= pai=, su\ d' h(ma=s a)/page pro\s do/mous, i(/na
to\n qumo\n ou(=tos e)s newte/rous a)fh=|,
kai\ gnw=| tre/fein th\n glw=ssan h(suxaite/ran
to\n nou=n t' a)mei/nw tw=n frenw=n h)\ nu=n fe/rei.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a(nh/r, a)/nac, be/bhke deina\ qespi/sas:
e)pista/mesqa d', e)c o(/tou leukh\n e)gw\
th/nd' e)k melai/nhs a)mfiba/llomai tri/xa,
mh/ pw/ pot' au)to\n yeu=dos e)s po/lin lakei=n.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: e)/gnwka kau)to\s kai\ tara/ssomai fre/nas.
to/ t' ei)kaqei=n ga\r deino/n, a)ntista/nta de\
a)/th| pata/cai qumo\n e)n deinw=| pa/ra.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: eu)bouli/as dei=, pai= *menoike/ws, labei=n.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: ti/ dh=ta xrh\ dra=n; fra/ze. pei/somai d' e)gw/.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e)lqw\n ko/rhn me\n e)k katw/ruxos ste/ghs
a)/nes, kti/son de\ tw=| prokeime/nw|, ta/fon.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: kai\ tau=t' e)painei=s kai\ dokei=s pareikaqei=n;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: o(/son g', a)/nac, ta/xista: sunte/mnousi ga\r
qew=n podw/keis tou\s kako/fronas bla/bai.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: oi)/moi: mo/lis me/n, kardi/as d' e)ci/stamai
to\ dra=n: a)na/gkh| d' ou)xi\ dusmaxhte/on.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: dra= nun ta/d' e)lqw\n mhd' e)p' a)/lloisin tre/pe.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: w(=d' w(s e)/xw stei/xoim' a)/n: i)/t' i)/t' o)pa/ones,
oi(/ t' o)/ntes oi(/ t' a)po/ntes, a)ci/nas xeroi=n
o(rma=sq' e(lo/ntes ei)s e)po/yion to/pon.
e)gw\ d', e)peidh\ do/ca th=|d' e)pestra/fh,
au)to/s t' e)/dhsa kai\ parw\n e)klu/somai.
de/doika ga\r mh\ tou\s kaqestw=tas no/mous
a)/riston h)=| sw/|zonta to\n bi/on telei=n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: poluw/nume, *kadmei/as nu/mfas a)/galma
kai\ *dio\s barubreme/ta
ge/nos, kluta\n o(\s a)mfe/peis
*)itali/an, me/deis de\
pagkoi/nois, *)eleusini/as
*dh|ou=s e)n ko/lpois, *bakxeu= *bakxa=n
o( matro/polin *qh/ban
naietw=n par' u(grw=n
*)ismhnou= r(ei/qrwn a)gri/ou t' e)pi\ spora=| dra/kontos

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: se\ d' u(pe\r dilo/fou pe/tras ste/roy o)/pwpe
lignu/s, e)/nqa *kwru/kiai
stei/xousi nu/mfai *bakxi/des,
*kastali/as te na=ma.
kai/ se *nusai/wn o)re/wn
kissh/reis o)/xqai xlwra/ t' a)kta\
polusta/fulos pe/mpei,
a)mbro/twn e)pe/wn
eu)azo/ntwn *qhbai/+as e)piskopou=nt' a)guia/s:

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ta\n e)k pa=sai tima=|s u(perta/tan po/lewn
matri\ su\n kerauni/a|:
kai\ nu=n, w(s biai/as e)/xetai
pa/ndamos po/lis e)pi\ no/sou,
molei=n kaqarsi/w| podi\ *parnasi/an u(pe\r klitu\n
h)\ stono/enta porqmo/n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: i)w\ pu=r pneio/ntwn xora/g' a)/strwn, nuxi/wn
fqegma/twn e)pi/skope,
pai= *dio\s ge/neqlon, profa/nhq'
w)=nac, sai=s a(/ma peripo/lois
*qui/aisin, ai(/ se maino/menai pa/nnuxoi xoreu/ousi
to\n tami/an *)/iakxon.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: *ka/dmou pa/roikoi kai\ do/mwn *)amfi/onos,
ou)k e)/sq' o(poi=on sta/nt' a)\n a)nqrw/pou bi/on
ou)/t' ai)ne/saim' a)\n ou)/te memyai/mhn pote/.
tu/xh ga\r o)rqoi= kai\ tu/xh katarre/pei
to\n eu)tuxou=nta to/n te dustuxou=nt' a)ei/:
kai\ ma/ntis ou)dei\s tw=n kaqestw/twn brotoi=s.
*kre/wn ga\r h)=n zhlwto/s, w(s e)moi/, pote/,
sw/sas me\n e)xqrw=n th/nde *kadmei/an xqo/na
labw/n te xw/ras pantelh= monarxi/an
hu)/qune, qa/llwn eu)genei= te/knwn spora=|:
kai\ nu=n a)fei=tai pa/nta. ta\s ga\r h(dona\s
o(/tan prodw=sin a)/ndres, ou) ti/qhm' e)gw\
zh=n tou=ton, a)ll' e)/myuxon h(gou=mai nekro/n.
plou/tei te ga\r kat' oi)=kon, ei) bou/lei, me/ga
kai\ zh= tu/rannon sxh=m' e)/xwn: e)a\n d' a)ph=|
tou/twn to\ xai/rein, ta)/ll' e)gw\ kapnou= skia=s
ou)k a)\n priai/mhn a)ndri\ pro\s th\n h(donh/n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ti/ d' au)= to/d' a)/xqos basile/wn h(/keis fe/rwn;

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: teqna=sin. oi( de\ zw=ntes ai)/tioi qanei=n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: kai\ ti/s foneu/ei; ti/s d' o( kei/menos; le/ge.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: *ai(/mwn o)/lwlen: au)to/xeir d' ai(ma/ssetai.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: po/tera patrw/|as h)\ pro\s oi)kei/as xero/s;

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: au)to\s pro\s au(tou=, patri\ mhni/sas fo/nou.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: w)= ma/nti, tou)/pos w(s a)/r' o)rqo\n h)/nusas.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: w(s w(=d' e)xo/ntwn ta)/lla bouleu/ein pa/ra.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: kai\ mh\n o(rw= ta/lainan *eu)rudi/khn o(mou=
da/marta th\n *kre/ontos. e)k de\ dwma/twn
h)/toi klu/ousa paido\s h)\ tu/xh| pa/ra.

sp.speaker: *eu)rudi/kh
sp.l: w)= pa/ntes a)stoi/, tw=n lo/gwn e)ph|sqo/mhn
pro\s e)/codon stei/xousa, *palla/dos qea=s
o(/pws i(koi/mhn eu)gma/twn prosh/goros.
kai\ tugxa/nw te klh=|qr' a)naspastou= pu/lhs
xalw=sa kai/ me fqo/ggos oi)kei/ou kakou=
ba/llei di' w)/twn: u(pti/a de\ kli/nomai
dei/sasa pro\s dmwai=si ka)poplh/ssomai
a)ll' o(/stis h)=n o( mu=qos au)=qis ei)/pate:
kakw=n ga\r ou)k a)/peiros ou)=s' a)kou/somai.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: e)gw/, fi/lh de/spoina, kai\ parw\n e)rw=
kou)de\n parh/sw th=s a)lhqei/as e)/pos.
ti/ ga/r se malqa/ssoim' a)\n w(=n e)s u(/steron
yeu=stai fanou/meq'; o)rqo\n a(lh/qei' a)ei/.
e)gw\ de\ sw=| podago\s e(spo/mhn po/sei
pedi/on e)p' a)/kron, e)/nq' e)/keito nhlee\s
kunospa/rakton sw=ma *polunei/kous e)/ti:
kai\ to\n me/n, ai)th/santes e)nodi/an qeo\n
*plou/twna/ t' o)rga\s eu)menei=s katasxeqei=n
lou/santes a(gno\n loutro/n, e)n neospa/sin
qalloi=s o(\ dh\ le/leipto sugkath/|qomen,
kai\ tu/mbon o)rqo/kranon oi)kei/as xqono\s
xw/santes au)=qis pro\s liqo/strwton ko/rhs
numfei=on *(/aidou koi=lon ei)sebai/nomen.
fwnh=s d' a)/pwqen o)rqi/wn kwkuma/twn
klu/ei tis a)kte/riston a)mfi\ pasta/da,
kai\ despo/th| *kre/onti shmai/nei molw/n.
tw=| d' a)qli/as a)/shma peribai/nei boh=s
e(/rponti ma=llon a)=sson, oi)mw/cas d' e)/pos
i(/hsi dusqrh/nhton: w)= ta/las e)gw/,
a)=r' ei)mi\ ma/ntis; a)=ra dustuxesta/thn
ke/leuqon e(/rpw tw=n parelqousw=n o(dw=n;
paido/s me sai/nei fqo/ggos. a)lla\ pro/spoloi,
i)/t' a)=sson w)kei=s kai\ parasta/ntes ta/fw|
a)qrh/saq', a(rmo\n xw/matos liqospadh=
du/ntes pro\s au)to\ sto/mion, ei) to\n *ai(/monos
fqo/ggon suni/hm' h)\ qeoi=si kle/ptomai.
ta/d' e)c a)qu/mou despo/tou keleusma/twn
h)qrou=men: e)n de\ loisqi/w| tumbeu/mati

th
 me
 kremasth
 au)xe/nos katei/domen,
bro/xw| mitw/dei sindo/nos kaqhmme/nhn,
to\n d' a)mfi\ me/ssh| peripeth= proskei/menon,
eu)nh=s a)poimw/zonta th=s ka/tw fqora\n
kai\ patro\s e)/rga kai\ to\ du/sthnon le/xos.
o( d' w(s o(ra=| sfe, stugno\n oi)mw/cas e)/sw
xwrei= pro\s au)to\n ka)nakwku/sas kalei=:
w)= tlh=mon, oi(=on e)/rgon ei)/rgasai: ti/na
nou=n e)/sxes; e)n tw=| sumfora=s diefqa/rhs;
e)/celqe, te/knon, i(ke/sio/s se li/ssomai.
to\n d' a)gri/ois o)/ssoisi papth/nas o( pai=s,
ptu/sas prosw/pw| kou)de\n a)nteipw/n, ci/fous
e(/lkei diplou=s knw/dontas. e)k d' o(rmwme/nou
patro\s fugai=sin h)/mplak': ei)=q' o( du/smoros
au(tw=| xolwqei/s, w(/sper ei)=x', e)pentaqei\s
h)/reise pleurai=s me/sson e)/gxos, e)s d' u(gro\n
a)gkw=n' e)/t' e)/mfrwn parqe/nw| prosptu/ssetai.
kai\ fusiw=n o)cei=an e)kba/llei r(oh\n
leukh=| pareia=| foini/ou stala/gmatos.
kei=tai de\ nekro\s peri\ nekrw=|, ta\ numfika\
te/lh laxw\n dei/laios ei)n *(/aidou do/mois,
dei/cas e)n a)nqrw/poisi th\n a)bouli/an
o(/sw| me/giston a)ndri\ pro/skeitai kako/n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ti/ tou=t' a)\n ei)ka/seias; h( gunh\ pa/lin

frou/dh, pri
 ei)pei=n e)sqlo
 h)\ kako
 lo/gon.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: kau)to\s teqa/mbhk': e)lpi/sin de\ bo/skomai
a)/xh te/knou klu/ousan e)s po/lin go/ous
ou)k a)ciw/sein, a)ll' u(po\ ste/ghs e)/sw
dmwai=s proqh/sein pe/nqos oi)kei=on ste/nein.
gnw/mhs ga\r ou)k a)/peiros, w(/sq' a(marta/nein.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ou)k oi)=d': e)moi\ d' ou)=n h(/ t' a)/gan sigh\ baru\
dokei= prosei=nai xh) ma/thn pollh\ boh/.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos
sp.l: a)ll' ei)so/mesqa, mh/ ti kai\ kata/sxeton
krufh=| kalu/ptei kardi/a| qumoume/nh|,
do/mous parastei/xontes: eu)= ga\r ou)=n le/geis,
kai\ th=s a)/gan ga/r e)sti/ pou sigh=s ba/ros.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: kai\ mh\n o(/d' a)/nac au)to\s e)fh/kei
mnh=m' e)pi/shmon dia\ xeiro\s e)/xwn,
ei) qe/mis ei)pei=n, ou)k a)llotri/an
a)/thn, a)ll' au)to\s a(martw/n.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: i)w\
frenw=n dusfro/nwn a(marth/mata
sterea\ qanato/ent',
w)= ktano/ntas te kai\
qano/ntas ble/pontes e)mfuli/ous.
w)/moi e)mw=n a)/nolba bouleuma/twn.
i)w\ pai=, ne/os ne/w| cu\n mo/rw|
ai)ai= ai)ai=,
e)/qanes, a)pelu/qhs
e)mai=s ou)de\ sai=s dusbouli/ais.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: oi)/m' w(s e)/oikas o)ye\ th\n di/khn i)dei=n.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: oi)/moi,
e)/xw maqw\n dei/laios: e)n d' e)mw=| ka/ra|
qeo\s to/t' a)/ra to/te me/ga ba/ros m' e)/xwn
e)/paisen, e)n d' e)/seisen a)gri/ais o(doi=s,
oi)/moi, lakpa/thton a)ntre/pwn xara/n.
feu= feu=, w)= po/noi brotw=n du/sponoi.

sp.speaker: *)eca/ggelos
sp.l: w)= de/spoq', w(s e)/xwn te kai\ kekthme/nos,
ta\ me\n pro\ xeirw=n ta/de fe/rwn, ta\ d' e)n do/mois
e)/oikas h(/kein kai\ ta/x' o)/yesqai kaka/.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: ti/ d' e)/stin au)= ka/kion e)k kakw=n e)/ti;

sp.speaker: *)eca/ggelos
sp.l: gunh\ te/qnhke, tou=de pammh/twr nekrou=,
du/sthnos, a)/rti neoto/moisi plh/gmasin.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: i)w/.
i)w\ duska/qartos *(/aidou limh/n,
ti/ m' a)/ra ti/ m' o)le/keis;
w)= kaka/ggelta/ moi
prope/myas a)/xh, ti/na qroei=s lo/gon;
ai)ai=, o)lwlo/t' a)/ndr' e)peceirga/sw.
ti/ fh/s, pai=; ti/n' au)= le/geis moi ne/on,
ai)ai= ai)ai=,
sfa/gion e)p' o)le/qrw|
gunaikei=on a)mfikei=sqai mo/ron;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: o(ra=n pa/restin: ou) ga\r e)n muxoi=s e)/ti.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: oi)/moi,
kako\n to/d' a)/llo deu/teron ble/pw ta/las.
ti/s a)/ra, ti/s me po/tmos e)/ti perime/nei;
e)/xw me\n e)n xei/ressin a)rti/ws te/knon,
ta/las, to\n d' e)/nanta prosble/pw nekro/n.
feu= feu= ma=ter a)qli/a, feu= te/knon.

sp.speaker: *)eca/ggelos
sp.l: h( d' o)cuqh/ktw| bwmi/a peri\ ci/fei
lu/ei kelaina\ ble/fara, kwku/sasa me\n
tou= pri\n qano/ntos *megare/ws kleino\n la/xos,
au)=qis de\ tou=de, loi/sqion de\ soi\ kaka\s
pra/ceis e)fumnh/sasa tw=| paidokto/nw|.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: ai)ai= ai)ai=,
a)ne/ptan fo/bw|. ti/ m' ou)k a)ntai/an
e)/paise/n tis a)mfiqh/ktw| ci/fei;
dei/laios e)gw/, ai)ai=,
deilai/a| de\ sugke/kramai du/a|.

sp.speaker: *)eca/ggelos
sp.l: w(s ai)ti/an ge tw=nde ka)kei/nwn e)/xwn
pro\s th=s qanou/shs th=sd' e)peskh/ptou mo/rwn

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: poi/w| de\ ka)pelu/sat' e)n fonai=s tro/pw|;

sp.speaker: *)eca/ggelos
sp.l: pai/sas u(f' h(=par au)to/xeir au(th/n, o(/pws
paido\s to/d' h)/|sqet' o)cukw/kuton pa/qos.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: w)/moi moi, ta/d' ou)k e)p' a)/llon brotw=n
e)ma=s a(rmo/sei pot' e)c ai)ti/as.
e)gw\ ga/r s' e)gw\ e)/kanon, w)\ me/leos,
e)gw/, fa/m' e)/tumon. i)w\ pro/spoloi,
a)/gete/ m' o(/ti ta/xist', a)/gete/ m' e)kpodw/n,
to\n ou)k o)/nta ma=llon h)\ mhde/na.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ke/rdh parainei=s, ei)/ ti ke/rdos e)n kakoi=s.
bra/xista ga\r kra/tista ta)n posi\n kaka/.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: i)/tw i)/tw,
fanh/tw mo/rwn o( ka/llist' e)/xwn
e)moi\ termi/an a)/gwn a(me/ran
u(/patos: i)/tw i)/tw,
o(/pws mhke/t' a)=mar a)/ll' ei)si/dw.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: me/llonta tau=ta. tw=n prokeime/nwn ti xrh\ me/lein
pra/ssein. me/lei ga\r tw=nd' o(/toisi xrh\ me/lein

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: a)ll' w(=n e)rw=, toiau=ta sugkathuca/mhn.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: mh/ nun proseu/xou mhde/n: w(s peprwme/nhs
ou)k e)/sti qnhtoi=s sumfora=s a)pallagh/.

sp.speaker: *kre/wn
sp.l: a)/goit' a)\n ma/taion a)/ndr' e)kpodw/n,
o(/s, w)= pai=, se/ t' ou)x e(kw\n ka/ktanon
se/ t' au)= ta/nd', w)/moi me/leos, ou)d' e)/xw
o(/pa| pro\s po/tera kliqw=: pa/nta ga\r
le/xria ta)n xeroi=n, ta\ d' e)pi\ krati/ moi
po/tmos dusko/mistos ei)sh/lato.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: pollw=| to\ fronei=n eu)daimoni/as
prw=ton u(pa/rxei. xrh\ de\ ta/ g' ei)s qeou\s
mhde\n a)septei=n. mega/loi de\ lo/goi
mega/las plhga\s tw=n u(perau/xwn
a)poti/santes
gh/ra| to\ fronei=n e)di/dacan.
